info.name: GoogleMonkeyR adjustments
info.description:
Written for Google search using GoogleMonkeyR http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/9310
With simple up-to-date (10/2013) styling rules to reduce unused vertical space at the top, both for search pages and image search pages.
Since GoogleMonkeyR script update to 1.7 (4/11/2013), adjustments aren't necessary, though the reduced vertical space is still usefull.
info.additionalInfo:
changed to regex
domain(www.google.be) is still there, otherwise I couldn't get this site to save this update, because it error's that the example url does not match the regex in the code
14/10/2013 -sorry now it does; Some more public suffixes are added. small adjustment to regex to support image search, supports encrypted google search.
Since GoogleMonkeyR script update to 1.7 (4/11/2013), adjustments aren't necessary, though the reduced vertical space is still usefull.
